scripts.debug: NODE_ENV=production npm run postcss && DEBUG=Eleventy* eleventy
scripts.dry-run: NODE_ENV=production npm run postcss && DEBUG=Eleventy* eleventy --dryrun
scripts.serve: npm run clean && npm run postcss && eleventy --serve
scripts.serve-quiet: npm run clean && npm run postcss && eleventy --serve --quiet
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run postcss && eleventy --watch
scripts.watch-quiet: npm run clean && npm run postcss && eleventy --watch --quiet
